title: Top Places to visit in Kargil, Jammu and Kashmir
content: Kargil is a town in the Kargil district in the Ladakh region of northern India. It is the second largest town in Ladakh after Leh. It is located 60 km and 204 km from Drass and Srinagar to the west respectively, 234 km from Leh to the east, 240 km from Padum to the southeast and 1,047 km from Del
